TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlForm extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 提供对服务器上的 HTML 元素的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是 Web 窗体页上的服务器控件的容器。The control is a container for server controls on a Web Forms page. 回发到服务器的所有服务器控件都必须放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间 。All server controls that post back to the server must be placed between the opening and closing tags of an control. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 仅允许 在 Web 窗体页上激活单个控件。ASP.NET allows only a single control to be active on a Web Forms page. 如果 Web 窗体页上有多个活动控件，则 当您请求该页时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。If there is more than one active control on a Web Forms page, the common language runtime will throw an exception when you request the page. 但是，可以使用 控件，其中每个 对象都包含一个 控件，因为 在任何给定时间只有一个对象处于活动状态。You can, however, use a control where each object contains one control, because only one is active at any given time. 可以 通过设置控件的属性来控制控件的行为。You can control the behavior of the control by setting its properties. 若要为窗体数据指定编码类型，请设置 属性。To specify the encoding type for the form's data, set the property. `GET` `POST` 浏览器用来将表单数据发布到服务器以进行处理的方法 (或) 通过设置属性来指定 。The method (`GET` or `POST`) that a browser uses to post form data to the server for processing is specified by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `POST`。By default, the property is set to `POST`. 您可以将此属性的值修改为 `GET` ，但这可能会破坏 ASP.NET 页框架提供的内置状态和回发服务。You can modify the value of this property to `GET`, but this might break the built-in state and postback services provided by the ASP.NET page framework. 可以将实现接口的控件配置 为发布到不同的目标页。You can configure controls that implement the interface to post to a different target page. 这称为跨页发送。This is referred to as cross-page posting. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100)). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类创建简单窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a simple form. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的跨页面发送

span.span: Cross-Page Posting in an ASP.NET Web Page

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你重写原始请求的 url 时，但你想要保留 HTML 窗体的 action 属性的原始 url 时，可使用属性。You use the property when you rewrite the URL of the original request but you want to retain the original URL for the action attribute of the HTML form. 将 属性设置为要保留的 URL 的值。Set the property to the value of the URL that you want to retain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止在呈现控件的多个实例时出现命名冲突，请为 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 页上的每个控件自动生成唯一值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered, [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] automatically generates a unique value for each control on a page. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置按 Enter 键时会引起回发的 控件的子控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control of the control that causes postback when the ENTER key is pressed.

value.span: 在加载 后要显示为默认按钮的按钮控件的 。

span.span: The of the button control to display as the default button when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您通过按窗体中的输入控件中的 enter 来指定用户可能会导致回发 (如) 的文本框。The property lets you specify that users can cause a postback by pressing ENTER in an input control in the form (such as a text box). 可以将从接口派生的任何控件指定为默认按钮 （控件除外） 。You can specify as a default button any control that derives from the interface except the control. 如果属性引用的控件 不是从派生的 ，则 会引发异常。If the control that is referenced by the property does not derive from , an exception is thrown. 如果使用的是母版页 ，并从内容页设置属性，请使用 按钮的属性 。If you are using master pages and you set the property from a content page, use the property of the button. 有关母版页的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 母版页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wtxbf3hh(v=vs.100))。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wtxbf3hh(v=vs.100)). 在以下情况下，该属性可能不会导致回发：The property might not cause a postback in the following scenarios: - 当焦点位于窗体中的输入控件之外时按 ENTER。Pressing ENTER when focus is outside the input controls in the form. 不保证会触发默认的回发操作。The default postback action is not guaranteed to be triggered. - 当焦点位于多行文本框内时按 ENTER。Pressing ENTER when focus is inside a multi-line text box. 在多行文本框中，预期的行为是在文本框中按 ENTER 创建新行。In a multi-line text box, the expected behavior is that pressing ENTER creates a new line in the text box. 在某些浏览器中，在多行文本框中按 ENTER 将触发回发。In some browsers, pressing ENTER inside a multi-line text box triggers a postback. 在这种情况下，如果希望 ENTER 改为创建新行，则可以将 JavaScript 函数附加到输入控件。In that case, if you want ENTER to create a new line instead, you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 脚本应捕获 ENTER 键并停止回发。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the postback. 例如，可以使用 属性集合添加事件的客户端脚本 `onKeyPress` 。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 指定 控件作为默认按钮。Specifying a control as a default button. 仅 支持和控件。Only and controls are supported. - 在异步回发过程中以编程方式更改属性。Changing the property programmatically during an asynchronous postback. 可以通过将一个或多个控件添加到页面上来启用异步回发 。Asynchronous postbacks can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) 和 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性设置 为设置导致回发的默认控件。The following example shows how to set the property to set the default control that causes a postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 作为默认按钮引用的控件的类型不是 。

span.span: The control referenced as the default button is not of the type .
ASP.NET Master Pages Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体上的控件，该控件要在加载 控件后显示为具有输入焦点的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded.

value.span: 窗体上的控件的 ，该控件要在加载 后显示为具有输入焦点的控件。

span.span: The of the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问窗体上的控件，以便在加载控件时将其显示为具有输入焦点的控件 。Use the property to access the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded. 可以选择的控件将显示一个视觉提示，指示它们具有焦点。Controls that can be selected are displayed with a visual cue indicating that they have the focus. 例如， 具有焦点的控件将显示在其内部的插入点。For example, a control with focus is displayed with the insertion point positioned inside of it. 还可以使用或方法设置具有焦点的控件 。The control with focus can also be set using the or methods. 这些方法优先于 属性。These methods have precedence over the property. 如果调用这两个方法中的任意一种来设置具有焦点的控件，则 忽略属性的值。If either of these methods are called to set the control with focus, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为在窗体加载时，将窗体上的指定控件显示为具有输入焦点的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to display a specified control on a form as the control with input focus when the form loads. 在 `Form1` 呈现时，请注意插入点位于中 `TextBox1` ，指示该 `TextBox1` 控件具有焦点。When `Form1` renders, notice that the insertion point is positioned in `TextBox1`, indicating that `TextBox1` is the control with focus. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置将窗体的数据发送到服务器时浏览器使用的编码类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding type a browser uses when posting the form's data to the server.

value.span: 字符串，它包含编码类型。

span.span: A string that contains the encoding type.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示使用浏览器的默认内容类型。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that the browser's default content type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定浏览器用于将数据回发到服务器的编码类型。Use the property to specify the encoding type a browser uses to post data back to the server. 下表显示了常见的编码类型。The following table shows the common encoding types. |编码类型Encoding type|说明Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |application/x-www-form-urlencodedapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded|窗体数据被编码为名称/值对。Form data is encoded as name/value pairs. 这是标准编码格式。This is the standard encoding format.| |多部分/窗体数据multipart/form-data|窗体数据将编码为一条消息，其中每个控件在页面上都有单独的部分。Form data is encoded as a message with a separate part for each control on the page.| |text/plaintext/plain|窗体数据是以纯文本编码的，不包含任何控件或格式字符。Form data is encoded in plain text, without any control or formatting characters.| 有关编码类型的详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站。For more information on encoding types, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定浏览器用于将数据发送回服务器的编码类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the encoding type the browser uses to send data back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示浏览器将窗体数据发送到服务器进行处理的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server for processing.

value.span: 字符串，它指示浏览器向服务器发送窗体数据的方式。

span.span: A string that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定浏览器将窗体数据发送到服务器进行处理的方式。Use this property to specify how the browser sends form data to the server for processing. 所有浏览器都支持的两种常见方法是 `GET` 和 `POST` 。The two common methods supported by all browsers are `GET` and `POST`. > [!CAUTION] > 您可以重写此属性的默认值，并使用 `GET` 方法而不是 `POST` 。You can override the default value of this property and use the `GET` method instead of `POST`. 但是，因为 `GET` 请求限制了它们可以包含的数据量，因此， `GET` 在某些情况下，使用方法可能会导致 ASP.NET 页框架提供的回发和状态管理功能失败。However, because `GET` requests are limited in how much data they can include, using the `GET` method can, in some cases, cause the postback and state management capabilities provided by the ASP.NET page framework to fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定窗体数据将回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that form data is posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 控件的标识符名称。

span.span: Gets the identifier name for the control.

value.span: 包含 的标识符名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier name for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定控件的唯一标识符名称 。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for an control. 在此实现中，获取此属性将返回属性的值 。In this implementation, getting this property returns the value of the property. 但是，设置属性不会将值分配给属性。However, setting the property does not assign a value to the property. 设置属性不会将值分配给此属性，因为 属性必须与属性具有相同的值 。Setting the property does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`属性不是符合 XHTML 标准的属性，不会由 ASP.NET 呈现，无论设置如何 `xhtmlConformance` 。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and is not rendered by ASP.NET regardless of the `xhtmlConformance` setting.

related.span: ASP.NET 和 XHTML 遵从性

span.span: ASP.NET and XHTML Compliance

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过方法通知时 ，Web 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by the method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中，尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，如果调用此方法，则不能访问其他服务器控件，无论它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保证其他服务器控件已创建并且可供访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此外，调用基类的 方法可确保 控件正确设置为网页窗体，并保存页面的视图状态。

span.span: Additionally, calling the base class's method ensures that the control is properly set as the Web page form and the page's view state is persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前调用方法 。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则该 方法将注册智能导航脚本文件引用，以便呈现它。If the property is set to `true`, the method registers the smart navigation script file reference so that it gets rendered. > [!NOTE] > 此 属性在 ASP.NET 版本2.0 中已弃用。The property has been deprecated in ASP.NET version 2.0.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `

exception.span: 只在引用 实例的情况下才呈现 控件。

span.span: The control is not rendered without a reference to the instance.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便 正确呈现控件的子控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法使用 方法检查 控件的特性，以确保它们可以在 HTML 元素的开始标记中呈现 `
` 。The method uses the method to check the control's attributes to ensure that they can be rendered in the opening tag of a `` HTML element. 此外，该 方法还呈现 `method` 控件的、 `action` 和 `onsubmit` 特性 。Additionally, the method renders the `method`, `action`, and `onsubmit` attributes of the control. 如果属性中设置的控件 ID 未实现 接口，则 会引发异常。If the control ID set in the property does not implement the interface, an exception is thrown. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

exception.span: 在 属性中设置的控件 ID 类型不是 。

span.span: The control ID set in the property is not of the type .

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便 正确呈现控件的特性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's attributes are correctly rendered.

span.span: Renders the child controls of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现客户端脚本，以确保将浏览器焦点设置为属性中指定的控件 。The method renders client script to ensure that the browser focus is set to the control specified in the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性指定的控件 优先于属性指定的控件 。A control specified by the property takes precedence over a control specified by the property.

exception.span: 网页有多个服务器端 标记。

span.span: The Web page has more than one server-side tag.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便 正确呈现控件的子控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指示是否强制客户端上被禁用的控件提交它们的值，以在页回发到服务器后允许这些控件保留它们的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values, allowing them to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server.

value.span: 如果强制客户端上被禁用的控件提交它们的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if controls disabled on the client are forced to submit their values; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否强制客户端上禁用的控件在页回发时提交其值。Use the property to specify whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values when the page posts back. 这允许禁用的控件在页回发到服务器后保留其值。This allows the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server. 如果将 属性设置为，则在 `false` 窗体上使用客户端脚本禁用的控件将不会在下一次回发页面时提交给服务器。When the property is set to `false`, controls on the form that have been disabled using client script will not be submitted to the server the next time the page posts back. 因此，由禁用控件存储的任何值都将丢失。As a result, any values stored by the disabled controls are lost. 若要允许禁用的控件在页回发到服务器后保留其值，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To allow the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 窗体上的属性设置为 `true` ，以使客户端脚本禁用的控件在页回发到服务器后保持其值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property on a form to `true` to cause controls disabled by client script to maintain their values after the page posts back to the server. 在此示例中，如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，然后单击 " **后退** " 按钮，则 html 文本框中的文本将丢失，并且不再选中 html 复选框。In this example, if you set the property to `false` and then click the **Post back** button, the text in the HTML text box is lost and the HTML check box is no longer selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/CS/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/VB/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置框架或窗口以呈现发送到服务器的信息结果。

span.span: Gets or sets the frame or window in which to render the results of information that is posted to the server.

value.span: 显示发送到服务器的信息结果的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the results of the information posted to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这会刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定显示发送到服务器的信息结果的目标窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the results of the information that is posted to the server. 重定向发送到服务器的信息的结果是一种高级任务。Redirecting the results of the information posted to the server is an advanced task. 不建议使用此属性来回发。Using this property simply to post back is not recommended. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为 `target` 属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` `form` XHTML 1.1 中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `form` elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈现的标记必须符合 XHTML 标准，或者必须符合辅助功能标准，请不要设置 属性。Therefore, if the rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual studio 中的 XHTML 标准和](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)) [visual studio 和 ASP.NET 中的 ASP.NET 和可访问性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)). 值必须以 a 到 Z 范围内的字母开头 (不区分大小写的) ，但以下具有下划线开头的特殊值除外。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定新的 unframed 窗口，以显示回发到服务器的信息的结果。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a new, unframed window to display the results of the information posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/CS/htmlformtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/VB/htmlformtargetvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取分配给 控件的唯一编程标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

value.span: 分配给 控件的唯一编程标识符。

span.span: The unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取分配给控件的唯一编程标识符 。Use the property to get the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control. 此属性将重写基实现，以便在控件包含在页之外的实现的 对象（如自定义服务器控件）中时返回一个常数值。This property overrides the base implementation to return a constant value when the control is contained in an -implemented object other than a page, such as a custom server control. 如果命名容器是页，则 返回控件的属性的值 。If the naming container is a page, the value of the control's property is returned. 属性和 属性始终返回相同的值。The property and the property always return the same value. 当 控件在要求 控件的 和属性相同的浏览器上呈现时，这非常有用 。This is useful when the control is rendered on a browser that requires the control's and properties to be the same. 为了保持这些属性同步， 属性始终返回属性的值 。To keep these properties synchronized, the property always returns the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > 该 `name` 属性不是符合 XHTML 标准的属性，并且默认情况下不由 ASP.NET 呈现。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and by default is not rendered by ASP.NET. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性检索控件的唯一标识符 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the unique identifier for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/CS/htmlform.uniqueidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/VB/htmlform.uniqueidvb.aspx#1)]
